com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities
Class Activity_NewIssueA

java.lang.Object
  ActivityGroup
      com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities.Activity_NewIssueA

public class Activity_NewIssueA
extends ActivityGroup

First activity for submitting an issue: select category, write a title, write a description, and attach an image. Then proceed to Activity_NewIssueB.

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis, Dr. Post-doctoral Researcher, Information Technologies Institute, ITI-CERTH, Thermi, Thessaloniki, Greece ververid@iti.gr, http://mklab.iti.gr
